originalText.text: Everything was great! The sales manager, Holly was so easy to work with and was able to execute my event within a matter of days. Chef Chris' cooking was amazing and a hit amongst our guests. Servers Leslie and Antonio were super helpful and also a delight to work with. Would definitely recommend and hire again. Thanks all!

text.text: Everything was great! The sales manager, Holly was so easy to work with and was able to execute my event within a matter of days. Chef Chris' cooking was amazing and a hit amongst our guests. Servers Leslie and Antonio were super helpful and also a delight to work with. Would definitely recommend and hire again. Thanks all!

originalText.text: I wish I could give Deborah Miller Catering 100 stars. From the initial conversations and quoting process, to the follow up prior to the event, the execution, the presentation, the staff - everything is exceptional. Everything on their menus is delicious and they have a wide variety of options. The staff is always friendly, polite, knowledgeable and very professional. Shout out to Elise for being amazing throughout the planning process. Always willing to hop on a call and answer any questions that I have. Deborah Miller catered a high end cocktail event we hosted as well as our company holiday party. If you're considering booking them, don't hesitate. Just do it!

originalText.text: Used this company for a client event hosted by a global hotel brand and it was absolutely amazing. From beginning to end Holly, who was our event manager, was communicative, informative, and so understanding. Service during the event flowed so well and the food was SOO GOOD. Will definitely utilize Deborah Miller Catering again!

text.text: Used this company for a client event hosted by a global hotel brand and it was absolutely amazing. From beginning to end Holly, who was our event manager, was communicative, informative, and so understanding. Service during the event flowed so well and the food was SOO GOOD. Will definitely utilize Deborah Miller Catering again!

originalText.text: I had worked with Deborah Miller catering many years ago and always found them to be easy to work with.  I recently just planned my first large event post-pandemic and they have not changed one bit! In fact, I feel that their quality has gotten even better.  The display of food and juice bar that they set up was beautiful and delicious.  The event was a huge success and we got rave reviews, everyone was asking us where the food was from.  Most importantly, we executed everything quickly and they were wonderful communicators.  Thank you!

text.text: I had worked with Deborah Miller catering many years ago and always found them to be easy to work with.  I recently just planned my first large event post-pandemic and they have not changed one bit! In fact, I feel that their quality has gotten even better. originalText.text: Deborah Miller Catering catered my daughter’s Sweet 16 and with their help, it was a great success.  They were extremely professional.  Their employees did an amazing job working with the venue and setting up the food stations.  We had multiple stations, including an ice cream bar.   During the event, the staff were efficient and kind to guests. Weeks later, the guests are still raving about the food.  Deb’s made it so easy for us, from setup to cleanup.  My daughter and the rest of our family could not have been happier.
